docs.summary: Returns the collection of IConfig objects.
Returns true if the source is read only.
Saves the value of all configurations to the parent IConfigSource.
docs.remarks: This can only can be done if the source IsReadOnly is false. This value depends on the method in which the file was loaded. For instance, if it is an INI file loaded from disk then this value is false, but if it is loaded by a TextReader then the value is true.

docs.summary: Saves all the IConfigSources in the current IConfigSource including those that were merged.
Merges all IConfigs from another IConfigSource into the Configs collection.
docs.exception: If the IConfigSource has already been merged. If the IConfigSource is this. If an IConfig of the same name already exists.
